summary.span: 表示用于对数据集合进行分组、排序、筛选和导航的视图。

span.span: Represents a view for grouping, sorting, filtering, and navigating a data collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不应在代码中创建此类的对象。You should not create objects of this class in your code. 若要创建仅实现的集合的集合视图 ，请创建一个 对象，将集合添加到 属性中，并从属性获取集合视图 。To create a collection view for a collection that only implements , create a object, add your collection to the property, and get the collection view from the property. 您可以将集合视图看作绑定源集合的一个层，它允许您根据排序、筛选和组查询来导航并显示集合，所有这些操作都无需处理基础源集合本身。You can think of a collection view as a layer on top of a binding source collection that allows you to navigate and display the collection based on sort, filter, and group queries, all without having to manipulate the underlying source collection itself. 如果源集合实现了 接口，则引发事件的更改将 传播到视图。If the source collection implements the interface, the changes that raise the event are propagated to the views. 由于视图不会更改基础源集合，因此，源集合可以有多个关联的视图。Because a view does not change the underlying source collection, a source collection can have multiple views associated with it. 通过使用视图，可以通过不同方式显示相同的数据。By using views, you can display the same data in different ways. 例如，您可以对对象集合使用两个视图， `Task` 以显示按优先级排序的任务（在页面的某个部分上按优先级排序），并在页面的另一部分上按区域分组。For example, you can use two views on a collection of `Task` objects to show tasks sorted by priority on one part of the page and grouped by area on another part of the page. 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 应用程序中，所有集合都具有关联的默认集合视图。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] applications, all collections have an associated default collection view. 绑定引擎始终通过关联视图访问集合，而不是直接使用集合。Rather than working with the collection directly, the binding engine always accesses the collection through the associated view. 若要获取默认视图，请使用 方法。To get the default view, use the method. 基于的内部类 是仅实现的集合的默认视图 。An internal class based on is the default view for collections that implement only . 是实现的集合的默认视图 。 is the default view for collections that implement . 是实现或的集合的默认视图 。 is the default view for collections that implement or . 或者，您可以使用类在中创建集合的视图 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] ，然后将控件绑定到该视图。Alternatively, you can create a view of your collection in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] by using the class and then bind your control to that view. 类是类的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 表示形式 。The class is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] representation of the class. 有关示例，请参阅 [如何：在 XAML 中使用视图对数据进行排序和分组](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/how-to-sort-and-group-data-using-a-view-in-xaml)。For an example, see [How to: Sort and Group Data Using a View in XAML](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/how-to-sort-and-group-data-using-a-view-in-xaml). 有关详细信息，请参阅 [数据绑定概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview)中的 "绑定到集合"。For more information, see "Binding to Collections" in [Data Binding Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview). 若要在中设置视图 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] ，请使用 类。To set a view in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], use the class. 类的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 表示形式 ，它公开了类中最常使用的成员 。 is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] representation of the class, and it exposes the most commonly used members of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property CurrentItem As Object
public: virtual property System::Object ^ CurrentItem { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取视图中的当前项。

span.span: Gets the current item in the view.

value.span: 视图中的当前项。

span.span: The current item of the view.

value.span: 默认情况下，该集合的第一项作为当前项启动。

span.span: By default, the first item of the collection starts as the current item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合视图支持当前记录指针的概念。Collection views support the concept of a current record pointer. 当您在 "集合" 视图中导航对象时，您将移动一个记录指针，该指针允许您检索存在于集合中该特定位置的对象。As you navigate through the objects in a collection view, you are moving a record pointer that allows you to retrieve the object that exists at that particular location in the collection. 请注意，移动当前记录指针与应用于集合的任何排序或筛选操作都有一定的交互。Note that moving the current record pointer has some interactions with any sorting or filtering that is applied to the collection. 排序将在所选的最后一条记录上保留当前记录指针，但集合视图将围绕它进行重构。Sorting preserves the current record pointer on the last record selected, but the collection view is restructured around it. (可能是所选记录之前位于列表的开头，但现在所选记录可能位于中间的某个位置。如果筛选后，) 筛选将保留选定记录。(Perhaps the selected record was at the beginning of the list before, but now the selected record might be somewhere in the middle.) Filtering preserves the selected record if that selection remains in view after the filtering. 否则，当前记录指针将设置为筛选的集合视图的第一条记录。Otherwise, the current record pointer is set to the first record of the filtered collection view. 如果绑定的目标为单独值，则将自动绑定到集合的当前项。The current item of the collection is bound to automatically if the target of a binding is a singleton value. 如果目标为 ，则当前项与选定项同步。If the target is an , the current item is synchronized with the selected item. 例如，如果列表框绑定到集合，则 将与当前选定项同步。For example, if a list box is bound to a collection, the is synchronized with the currently selected item.

para.span: 只有传递对其他内部对象的货币处理调用的类 应重写此属性; 所有其他派生类应使用 方法更新存储在基类中的当前值。

span.span: Only classes that pass currency handling calls to another internal object should override this property; all other derived classes should use the method to update the current values stored in the base class.

summary.span: 进入延迟循环，该循环可用于将更改合并到视图并延迟自动刷新。

span.span: Enters a defer cycle that you can use to merge changes to the view and delay automatic refresh.

returns.span: 一个可用于释放调用对象的 对象。

span.span: An object that you can use to dispose of the calling object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 典型的用法是 `using` 使用此方法创建一个范围，然后在该范围内放置多个视图更改调用。The typical usage is to create a `using` scope with this method and then place multiple view-changing calls within the scope. 这会延迟自动刷新，直到延迟周期退出。This delays automatic refresh until the defer cycle is exited.

span.span: The item to locate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此方法返回-1 以外的索引，则必须始终为 true，查看 [index-1] < 项 <= 视图 [index]，其中使用 视图的方法（如果存在）进行比较。If this method returns an index other than -1, it must always be true that view[index-1] < item <= view[index], where the comparisons are done using the method of the view, if one exists. 某些事件处理程序使用方法的这一特定行为 来加快对插入和删除的反应。This particular behavior of the method is used by some event handlers to speed up reaction to insertion and deletion. 如果派生类不重写此方法，则侦听器使用方法执行二进制搜索 。If the derived class does not override this method, a listener does a binary search using the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示视图的内部状态是否已更改并需要 方法调用。This property indicates if the internal state of the view has changed and requires a method call. 典型的情况是，当 视图处于延迟刷新周期时，如果已将或类似添加到视图中 (请参阅 ) 。The typical scenario is if a or similar has been added to the view while the view is in a deferred refresh cycle (see ). 在这种情况下，不需要对进行显式调用 ; 在延迟刷新周期结束后，视图将自动调用刷新。In this scenario, no explicit call to is needed; as soon as the deferred refresh cycle ends, the view calls refresh automatically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从派生类的构造函数调用此重载。Call this overload from constructor of a derived class. 不要将 属性（它是虚拟属性）作为进行传递 `count` 。Do not pass the property, which is a virtual property, as `count`. 相反，传递表示集合的内部的计数 。Instead, pass the count of the internal that represents the collection. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies).

summary.span: 获取 结构的集合，该集合描述集合中的项在视图中的排序方式。

span.span: Gets a collection of structures that describes how the items in the collection are sorted in the view.

value.span: 在所有情况下均为空 。

span.span: An empty in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能向 返回 (空) 集合中添加，因为基类不 支持排序。You cannot add a to the returned (empty) collection because the base class does not support sorting. 相反，请使用派生类，这样就 支持排序。Instead, use the derived classes and that do support sorting. 另外， 在添加或删除对象之前，请检查属性 以避免异常。Also, check the property before adding or removing objects to avoid an exception.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否必须更新更改日志，因为在没有先进入[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 线程调度程序的情况下，已在其他线程上收到 通知。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether it has been necessary to update the change log because a notification has been received on a different thread without first entering the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] thread dispatcher.

value.span: 如果有必要更新更改日志，因为在 未首先进入线程调度程序的情况下已在另一个线程上收到通知 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] ，则为; 否则为 。

span.span: if it has been necessary to update the change log because a notification has been received on a different thread without first entering the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] thread dispatcher; otherwise, .
